Zeus.name: Zeus
Zeus.description: King of the Gods, master of lightning and the sky.

Hera.name: Hera
Hera.description: Queen of the Gods, protector of marriage and family.

Athena.name: Athena
Athena.description: Goddess of wisdom, courage, and strategic warfare.

Jupiter.name: Jupiter
Jupiter.description: The Roman equivalent of Zeus, god of the sky and thunder.

Juno.name: Juno
Juno.description: The Roman equivalent of Hera, protector of the Roman people.

Minerva.name: Minerva
Minerva.description: The Roman equivalent of Athena, goddess of wisdom and strategic warfare.

Anubis.name: Anubis
Anubis.description: God of the dead and the embalming process, protector of tombs.

Horus.name: Horus
Horus.description: God of the sky, kingship, and order.

Osiris.name: Osiris
Osiris.description: God of the afterlife, the underworld, and rebirth.
